name: Burak Duman
tagline: UNB BCS '24 • Building FIXXit — a marketplace connecting people with contractors.

entries.title: Graduated — BCS, University of New Brunswick
entries.description: Completed Bachelor of Computer Science at UNB.

entries.title: Started FIXXit
entries.description: Founded FIXXit, a two-sided marketplace connecting people with trusted contractors across home services and events — from painting and security to DJing and hairstyling. Built listings, profiles, search, and booking flows to streamline getting jobs posted and done.

entries.title: Shipped Portfolio v1
entries.description: This site. Bottom-up timeline, easy to extend via JSON.
